column4: Hi, I'm not sure whether to ask this question here or in #kubuntu, but I'll try here first since there are more people:

Can I use the command shown on the following website to turn a kubuntu I would install over ubuntu (kubuntu-desktop package) into a "real/pure/clean" kubuntu, that is just as if I had installed it from the Kubuntu CD?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
